name: TZDAllergySCT
title: TZD Allergy SCT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Concepts that could be used to indicate an allergy to Thiazolidinediones (TZD)),(Data Element Scope: ALLERGY_INTOLERANCE: Thiazolidinediones:),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes at both the class and the individual drug level. Includes codes both with and without allergy context),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
